name: Batten!!
description:
Batten!! is a game about moving a ship around a tiny ocean. You can steer the ship and you can also turn your sail to catch the wind. Catching the wind is important, that's how you do the moving part.

This was and is a learning project and part of the learning is putting it out into the world. It's barely anything and I definitely wouldn't charge money for it but listen I'm not gonna fight you if you want to donate <3

That's it that's the whole thing Send tweet
